#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x)
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
ll arr[SIZE];
int n,q,idx,l,r,type;
ll X;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    cin>>n>>q;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr[i];
    while(q--)
    {
        cin>>type;
        if(type==1)
        {
           cin>>idx>>X;
           arr[--idx]=X;
        }
        else
        {
          cin>>l>>r>>X;
          vector<int> v1(arr+l-1,arr+r);
          sort(all(v1));
         int cnt=0;
         while(cnt<v1.size()&&v1[cnt]<=X)
            cnt++;
         cout<<cnt<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
